formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["verification@equifinance.com"],"subject":"Employment Verification Confirmation","body":"Dear EquiFinance Verification Team,

This message confirms that the employee referenced in your recent request is currently employed with our organization in a full-time capacity. Their start date falls in early 2022, and they presently hold a mid-level software engineering role averaging a standard 40-hour work week.

We trust this satisfies your verification requirements. Should you need any further clarification within the scope of an employment confirmation, please feel free to reach out to our Human Resources department.

Kind regards,
Human Resources Department"}
